item.title: (Zn) 1anv [deposited on: 1996/03/14, revised on: 1997/02/12]
item.description: Header: [dna-binding protein 14-mar-96 1anv] Title: [adenovirus 5 dbp/uranyl fluoride soak] Compound: [mol_id: 1; molecule: adenovirus single-stranded dna-binding protein; chain: null; fragment: c-terminal domain, residues 174 - 529] Source: [mol_id: 1; organism_scientific: human adenovirus type 5] Keywords: [dna-binding protein, zinc-finger, phosphorylation, nuclear protein] Authors[p.n.kanellopoulos,d.tsernoglou,p.c.van der vliet,p.a.tucker] ExpData[x-ray diffraction] R-value[0.20] Resolution[2.70]

item.title: (Zn) 1dzu [deposited on: 2000/03/07, revised on: 2000/07/20]
item.description: Header: [lyase (aldehyde) 07-mar-00 1dzu] Title: [l-fuculose-1-phosphate aldolase from escherichia coli mutant t26a] Compound: [mol_id: 1; molecule: l-fuculose-1-phosphate aldolase; chain: p; ec: 4.1.2.17; engineered: yes; mutation: yes] Source: [mol_id: 1; organism_scientific: escherichia coli; expression_system: escherichia coli; expression_system_strain: jm 105; expression_system_plasmid: pkkfa2-t26a; other_details: t26a substitution performed with phosphorothioate method using m13mp19] Keywords: [bacterial l-fucose metabolism, cleavage of l-fuculose-1-phosphate to dihydroxyacetonephosphate and l-lactaldehyde, mutant structure] Authors[a.c.joerger,g.e.schulz] ExpData[x-ray diffraction] R-value[0.15] Resolution[2.09]

item.title: (Zn) 1ffy [deposited on: 2000/07/26, revised on: 2000/08/07]
item.description: Header: [ligase/rna 26-jul-00 1ffy] Title: [insights into editing from an ile-trna synthetase structure with trna(ile) and mupirocin] Compound: [mol_id: 1; molecule: isoleucyl-trna synthetase; chain: a; synonym: isoleucine--trna ligase, ilers; ec: 6.1.1.5; engineered: yes; mol_id: 2; molecule: isoleucyl-trna; chain: t; engineered: yes] Source: [mol_id: 1; organism_scientific: staphylococcus aureus; organism_common: bacteria; expression_system: escherichia coli; mol_id: 2; synthetic: yes; other_details: in vitro transcription of e.coli trna sequence] Keywords: [protein-rna complex, metal ions, editing trna synthetase, double-sieve, ligase/rna, mupirocin] Authors[l.f.silvian,j.wang,t.a.steitz] ExpData[x-ray diffraction] R-value[0.24] Resolution[2.20]

item.title: (Zn) 1jk1 [deposited on: 2001/07/11, revised on: 2001/10/19]
